mapper.select: SELECT B.RN, B.NO, B.WRITER, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.POSTDATE, B.LASTDATE, B.HIT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.NO, A.WRITER, A.TITLE, A.CONTENT, A.POSTDATE, A.LASTDATE, A.HIT FROM (SELECT NO, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, POSTDATE, LASTDATE, HIT FROM NOTICE ORDER BY NO DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE VALUES (NOTICE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0)
